Specimen Type: Cervical samples (Pap smears), sputum, body fluids (pleural, peritoneal, urine, cerebrospinal fluid)
Purpose: To analyze cytological slides for detection of cellular abnormalities, inflammation, infections, and other pathological conditions.
Container: Appropriate specimen collection container (e.g., sterile cup or vial) suitable for the specimen type
Equipment: Light microscope, microscope slides, cytological fixatives (95% ethanol or spray fixative), staining reagents (Papanicolaou stain, Hematoxylin and Eosin), laboratory timer
